title: List of all Androidfresco image   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidfresco image   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: fresco
repoList.description: An Android library for managing images and the memory they use.

repoList.name: FrescoImageViewer
repoList.description: Customizable Android full screen image viewer for Fresco library supporting "pinch to zoom" and "swipe to dismiss" gestures. Made by Stfalcon

repoList.name: fresco-processors
repoList.description: An Android image processor library providing a variety of image transformations for Fresco.

repoList.name: FrescoDemo
repoList.description: A demo use Fresco to load image and base on Chris Banes' s Android Design library

repoList.name: fresco-sample-usage
repoList.description: Android demo project as sample usage for Facebook's Fresco in detail, which is an awesome image loading library for Android.

repoList.name: FrescoFaceDetectionProcessor
repoList.description: A memory efficient Android image processor library providing cropping above Face Detection (Face Centering) for Fresco.

repoList.name: transformers
repoList.description: An Android transformation library providing a variety of image transformations for Coil, Glide, Picasso, and Fresco.

repoList.name: Landscapist
repoList.description: 🍂 Jetpack Compose image loading library which can fetch and display network images using Glide, Coil, and Fresco.

repoList.name: SliderImage
repoList.description: Kotlin library to load images with a view pager with indicator and fullscreen.

repoList.name: Fresco_GridView
repoList.description: [Android] A simple project for loading images into GridView. Compared several different image loader library, such as Facebook Fresco, Picasso and Universal Image Loader.
